00030 - (void)load {
00031         if (!isGhost) return;
00032         
00033         // Grab all of the data for this particular section.
00034         NSString *query = [[NSString alloc] initWithFormat:@"SELECT tag, display_name FROM OSes WHERE id=%@", identifier];
00035         
00036         sqlite3_stmt *statement;
00037         
00038         if (sqlite3_prepare_v2([DatabaseHelper getDatabase], [query UTF8String], -1, &statement, NULL) != SQLITE_OK) {
00039                 NSAssert(0, @"Query did not successfully complete.");
00040         }
00041         
00042         if (sqlite3_step(statement) == SQLITE_ROW) {
00043                 tag = [NSString stringWithUTF8String:(char *)sqlite3_column_text(statement, 0)];
00044                 name = [NSString stringWithUTF8String:(char *)sqlite3_column_text(statement, 1)];
00045         }
00046         
00047         //[query release];
00048         
00049         /*
00050         [sections addObject:self];
00051         
00052         // Figure out which entries belong to this section.
00053         sqlite3_reset(statement);

00055         
00056         if (sqlite3_prepare_v2([DatabaseHelper getDatabase], [query UTF8String], -1, &statement, NULL) != SQLITE_OK) {
00057                 NSAssert(0, @"Query did not successfully complete.");
